name: LondonDLRTimes
0:
”Alexa, ask D.L.R. for the next train”
”Alexa, ask D.L.R. next train from Bank”
”Alexa, ask D.L.R. next train at City Airport”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: d. l. r.
des:
Ask this skill for the next train from a Docklands Light Railway (DLR) station in London. The station is saved, after than just ask for 'next train'. The skill uses the live arrivals feed from TfL and will read them out.

For example, you can ask for "next train from Shadwell". After that, just ask for the "next train" to get the Shadwell arrivals again.

More info about saved results:
• The station you last asked for is saved
• Ask for 'next train' and the saved information from the previous query is used
• Ask to forget the station and the stored station will be cleared. Subsequent enquiries will then also ask for the station without saving it
• Ask to reset the settings, and the original behaviour is restored

Notes about the data used: The arrivals data is supplied by TfL Open Data: "Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database rights 2016 and Geomni UK Map data © and database rights 2019."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
